properties.entry: The title must have 40 characters maximum length

The author name must contain latin uppercase characters.
Some example of valid author are described below:
  • AUTHOR
  • AUTHOR T

The publisher name must contain latin uppercase characters.
Some example of valid publisher are described below:
  • PUBLISHER
  • PUBLISHER T
The year published must be previous than current

The four parts of an ISBN13 are as follows
  • Group or country identifier which identifies a national or geographic grouping of publishers
  • Publisher identifier which identifies a particular publisher within a group
  • Title identifier which identifies a particular title or edition of a title
  • Check digit is the single digit at the end of the ISBN which validates the ISBN
Some example of valid ISBN13 are described below:
  • 978-0-596-52068-7
  • 978 0 596 52068 7
  • 9780596520687
The edition number must be between 1-9
The description of book length must be at least 1 characters and maximum length of 100
The type of file must be .pdf and the maximum size 50 megabyte
Please fill in at least one field!
ISBN13 already exists, enter a different isbn.
